item.title: Can sum1 explain 1 thing for me? About custom weps, ID's
item.dc:creator: @Ic3_Barrage Ic3 Barrage
item.description:
@Ic3_Barrage wrote:

Ok let’s say i have this code.

if(i == 4708){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 8741;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 8700;
class8.anInt174 = 5037;
class8.anInt181 = 770;
class8.anInt190 = 164;
class8.anInt198 = 156;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 3;
class8.anInt194 = -3;
class8.anInt165 = 4954;
class8.anInt200 = 5031;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Grahrim’s Hood”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “GrAhrim’s hood.”.getBytes();
}

What item ID would i put it at? Any id i want? Like, would i leave it as default id, 4708, or would i just change it to any hood id? Or any id, doesnt matter, like put it at 747 (GLow Dagger, would it turn into my custom item? Or what? Idk if i expalined this enough, if you want me to explain it better just say so.

thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Can sum1 explain 1 thing for me? About custom weps, ID's
